snippet: Former President Francisco Flores will face embezzlement and other corruption charges related to what prosecutors said Wednesday was the misappropriation of at least $5.3 million in loans from Taiwan during his tenure, from 1999 to 2004.
abstract: El Salvador's former Pres Francisco Flores will face embezzlement and other corruption charges related to what prosecutors say was the misappropriation of at least $5.3 million in loans from Taiwan during his tenure, from 1999 to 2004.
lead_paragraph: Former President Francisco Flores will face embezzlement and other corruption charges related to what prosecutors said Wednesday was the misappropriation of at least $5.3 million in loans from Taiwan during his tenure, from 1999 to 2004.
